member.name: D2D1_IMAGE_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.sourceRectangle
member.summary: The source rectangle in the image space from which the image will be tiled or interpolated.

member.name: D2D1_IMAGE_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.extendModeX
member.summary: The extend mode in the image x-axis.

member.name: D2D1_IMAGE_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.extendModeY
member.summary: The extend mode in the image y-axis.

member.name: D2D1_IMAGE_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.interpolationMode
member.summary: The interpolation mode to use when scaling the image brush.
